definitions: To travel in a boat or ship for pleasure, typically without a fixed destination.
To travel at a moderate speed.
To move about an area in an automobile, often aimlessly or in search of something.
To win or achieve something easily.
examples: They decided to cruise the Caribbean for their vacation.
The car was cruising down the highway.
He spent the evening cruising the main street.
The team cruised to victory in the final game.
